price: ߤߍ߲߬ ߊߟߎ߬ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߸ ߡߎ߲߬ ߠߴߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߝߐ߫ ߟߴߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā tafʿalūna
